levels.levelDescription: The Shadowed Depths are hidden beneath the veil of darkness, where the ground is made of eerie dark-dirt and treacherous deep-dark-holes lie in wait to test the bravery of any who dare to venture into this abyss.

The Frostbite Plateau is a frozen wasteland covered in shimmering snow, where icy waters threaten to freeze the unwary traveler. The chilling winds howl through the icy landscape, creating a harsh environment for any who seek to cross this unforgiving terrain.

The Rusty Chain Stronghold is a fortress built upon precarious rusty-chain-platforms, suspended above rivers of molten lava that flow ominously below. The heat from the lava seeps through the rusted chains, creating a dangerous and volatile environment for those who dare to challenge the fiery depths.
